about_the_game: Unlock Sheila's Little Girl's Room in this exciting DLC! Immerse yourself in the charming project of remodeling shy Lynda's world. As a home-loving sweetheart, her room must become a paradisiacal study sanctuary brimming with comfort. You are tasked with creating a serene and stimulating environment that fosters both relaxation and intellectual growth. With every design decision, watch Lynda's haven unfold, turning her everyday space into a magical world of her own. Let your creativity shape Lynda's ultimate comfort zone!
detailed_description: Unlock Sheila's Little Girl's Room in this exciting DLC! Immerse yourself in the charming project of remodeling shy Lynda's world. As a home-loving sweetheart, her room must become a paradisiacal study sanctuary brimming with comfort. You are tasked with creating a serene and stimulating environment that fosters both relaxation and intellectual growth. With every design decision, watch Lynda's haven unfold, turning her everyday space into a magical world of her own. Let your creativity shape Lynda's ultimate comfort zone!

short_description: Join Sheila in making over shy Lynda's room! Transform it into the world's comfiest study sanctuary that this little homebird deserves. Let's create a delightful haven for Lynda!
